headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  WIESEL, ELIE: THE AMERICAN ACADEMY OF ARTS AND LETTERS NOTES WITH SORROW THE DEATH OF OUR ESTEEMED COLLEAGUE. HIS WRITING BEARS WITNESS TO THE HORRIFIC CAPABILITIES OF MAN, AND POWERFULLY ADVOCATES FOR HUMAN DIGNITY AND TOLERANCE. 1

keywords.value: WIESEL, ELIE: THE AMERICAN ACADEMY OF ARTS AND LETTERS NOTES WITH SORROW THE DEATH OF OUR ESTEEMED COLLEAGUE. HIS WRITING BEARS WITNESS TO THE HORRIFIC CAPABILITIES OF MAN, AND POWERFULLY ADVOCATES FOR HUMAN DIGNITY AND TOLERANCE. 1
keywords.name: persons

snippet: WIESEL--Elie: The American Academy of Arts and Letters notes with sorrow the death of our esteemed colleague. His writing bears witness to the horrific capabilities of man, and powerfully advocates for human dignity and tolerance. 1...
lead_paragraph: WIESEL--Elie: The American Academy of Arts and Letters notes with sorrow the death of our esteemed colleague. His writing bears witness to the horrific capabilities of man, and powerfully advocates for human dignity and tolerance. 1
